CustomField.formula: IF ( Hold_Funds_From_Grantmaking__c = TRUE, 0, Amount__c + Total_Fund_Allocation_Adjustments__c + Total_Grantmaking_Eligible_from_GAUs__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Amount + Total Amount from child Fund Allocation Adjustments + Total Grantmaking Amount from child GAU Allocations. This, unless "Hold Funds From Grantmaking" box is checked, in which case will be $0 (to prevent users from using funds before FA is ready).
CustomField.label: Total Amount
